comments.body: No, that shouldn't be necessary. This is based on SortShuffleSuite, which uses the same pattern to extend a general test base case to run with a specific shuffle manager: https://github.com/apache/spark/blob/master/core/src/test/scala/org/apache/spark/SortShuffleSuite.scala
